text: Robert "Bob" Dolan (April 5, 1929 â€“ April 24, 2016) was an American marine geologist. He was a professor of Coastal Geology at the University of Virginia. He was born in Los Angeles, California. He was the co-creator of the Dolan/Davis Scale for Nor'easter. Dolan died in Charlottesville, Virginia at the age of 87 on April 24, 2016. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American geologists Category:Scientists from Los Angeles Category:Scientists from Virginia Category:University of Virginia faculty
title: Robert Dolan (marine geologist)
